title: The Effects of war never change
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Dept. of Planning and Community Development, partner

abstract: Jeff served in Vietnam for less than 2 years , but it would effect him for the rest of his life.
description: Jeff only served 2 years in the army in South Vietnam. It was extremely hard to return to normal life and keep an office job after one year in the jungle. The reaction to Vietnam veterans in Australia only made it harder for him to adjust back into a normal life.
